div.p: ResponseType is an optional attribute attached to the element rResponses (belonging to WRITING RECEPTION ) that specifies the historical timing of a response to a written work through its values of "recent," "re-evaluation," or "initial." The two sibling attributes are Formality and genderedResponse.

Use one value of ResponseType to indicate whether a response to a work occurred at or close to the time of its publication ("initial") or recently ("recent"). "Re-evaluation" is used for a time which is neither initial nor recent, or also when there has been (at any time) a significant re-evaluation of a woman writer's work and its worth. Obviously judgement is involved in deciding, for instance, how recent is recent.
